sqlMap.select: SELECT F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , F.LA_CRDNT , F.LO_CRDNT , A.GIS_ASSETS_NM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A WHERE 1 = 1 AND F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND LA_CRDNT IS NOT NULL AND LO_CRDNT IS NOT NULL

SELECT F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , F.LA_CRDNT , F.LO_CRDNT , A.GIS_ASSETS_NM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , PHOTO.PHOTO_SJ , PHOTO.FILENM_PHYSICL , PHOTO.FILENM_LOGIC FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F LEFT JOIN PRT_FCLTY_PHOTO_F PHOTO ON F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = PHOTO.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = PHOTO.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = PHOTO.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = PHOTO.PRT_FCLTY_SE, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A WHERE 1 = 1 AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #gisPrtFcltyCd# AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ = #gisPrtFcltySeq# AND F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = #prtFcltySe# AND ROWNUM=1
